conditions.effect: TDS Certificate is visible and mandatory

intra_panel_references.logic_source: If "Yes" then TDS certificate upload field is mandatory. If
, field will be hidden. Upload size is 15 Mb

cross_panel_references_noted.logic: If 4 chars of PAN are C then CIN certificate mandatory
cross_panel_references_noted.note: PAN field is in a different panel (likely Vendor Details or similar)

cross_panel_references_noted.logic: If 4 chars of PAN are C then CIN number is mandatory
cross_panel_references_noted.note: PAN field is in a different panel (likely Vendor Details or similar)

cross_panel_references_noted.logic: If ID Type is ZCUCIN then its Mandatory
cross_panel_references_noted.note: ID Type field is in a different panel

cross_panel_references_noted.logic: Panel applicable only for India-Domestic, Hidden for other process types
cross_panel_references_noted.note: Process type is typically determined at form/workflow level
